sentences.sCn: 激进的动物权利保护团体

sentences.sContent: After the assassination of Martin Luther King, black leaders became more militant.
sentences.sCn: 马丁•路德•金遇刺后，黑人领袖变得更为激进了。

sentences.sContent: Even now we could not be sure that the militants would not find some new excuse to call a strike the following winter.
sentences.sCn: 即使到现在，我们也不能确定这些激进分子不会找到某个新的借口在下一年冬天号召一场罢工。

synos.tran: 富有战斗性的人；好斗者

words.tran: 军国主义；尚武精神，好战态度；职业军人的精神

trans.tranOther: a militant organization or person is willing to use strong or violent action in order to achieve political or social change

trans.tranCn: 好斗的人， 激进分子
